item.Q:
Write the character:
1: kind
2: to plant; to cultivate
item.A:
traditional: 種
1: zhǒng 2: zhòng
这种 (這種) zhèzhǒng this; this kind of; this sort of; this type of 种植 (種植) zhòngzhí plant; grow

item.Q:
Write the character:
hand; convenient
item.A:
shǒu
手段 shǒuduàn method; mean (of doing sth)

item.Q:
Write the character:
already; to stop; then; afterwards
item.A:
yǐ
已经 (已經) yǐjīng already

item.Q:
Write the character:
clear; bright; to understand; next; the Ming dynasty (1368- 1644); surname
item.A:
míng
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

item.Q:
Write the character:
to beat; to strike; to hit; to break; to type; to mix up; to build; to fight; to fetch; to make; to tie up; to issue; to shoot; to calculate; since; from
item.A:
dǎ
打击 (打擊) dǎjī to hit; to strike; to attack

item.Q:
Write the character:
highest; greatest; too (much); very; extremely
item.A:
tài
太太 tàitai married woman; Mrs.; Madam; wife

item.Q:
Write the character:
outside; in addition; foreign; external
item.A:
wài
外国 (外國) wàiguó foreign (country)

item.Q:
Write the character:
each; every
item.A:
gè
各个 (各個) gège various

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (will, shall, "future tense"); ready; prepared; to get; to use
2: a general
item.A:
traditional: 將
1: jiāng 2: jiàng
将来 (將來) jiānglái (the) future 将领 (將領) jiànglǐng high-ranking military officer

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: few; little; lack
2: young
item.A:
1: shǎo 2: shào
减少 (減少) jiǎnshǎo to lessen; to decrease; to reduce; to lower 少年 shàonián juvenile; youngster

item.Q: 种
item.A:
traditional: 種
1: zhǒng 2: zhòng
1: kind
2: to plant; to cultivate
这种 (這種) zhèzhǒng this; this kind of; this sort of; this type of 种植 (種植) zhòngzhí plant; grow

item.A:
shǒu
hand; convenient
手段 shǒuduàn method; mean (of doing sth)

item.Q: 已
item.A:
yǐ
already; to stop; then; afterwards
已经 (已經) yǐjīng already

míng
clear; bright; to understand; next; the Ming dynasty (1368- 1644); surname Ming
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

item.Q: 打
item.A:
dǎ
to beat; to strike; to hit; to break; to type; to mix up; to build; to fight; to fetch; to make; to tie up; to issue; to shoot; to calculate; since; from
打击 (打擊) dǎjī to hit; to strike; to attack

item.A:
tài
highest; greatest; too (much); very; extremely
太太 tàitai married woman; Mrs.; Madam; wife

item.A:
wài
outside; in addition; foreign; external
外国 (外國) wàiguó foreign (country)

gè
each; every
各个 (各個) gège various

item.A:
traditional: 將
1: jiāng 2: jiàng
1: (will, shall, "future tense"); ready; prepared; to get; to use
2: a general
将来 (將來) jiānglái (the) future 将领 (將領) jiànglǐng high-ranking military officer

2: young
减少 (減少) jiǎnshǎo to lessen; to decrease; to reduce; to lower 少年 shàonián juvenile; youngster

1: zhǒng 2: zhòng
